solution_line_template: For the chocolate cakes: Leila should pay: {price_chocolate_cake} * {num_chocolate_cakes} = ${<<{price_chocolate_cake}*{num_chocolate_cakes}={cost_chocolate_cakes}>>}{cost_chocolate_cakes}
For the strawberry cakes: Leila should pay: {price_strawberry_cake} * {num_strawberry_cakes} = ${<<{price_strawberry_cake}*{num_strawberry_cakes}={cost_strawberry_cakes}>>}{cost_strawberry_cakes}
Combining the chocolate cakes and strawberry cakes, Leila should pay: {cost_chocolate_cakes} +{cost_strawberry_cakes} = ${<<{cost_chocolate_cakes}+{cost_strawberry_cakes}={total_cost}>>}{total_cost}
